Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util
Synopsis Utilities: functions, data types and interfaces with external libraries.
Details Benchmark Eval IDE Math Maybe Monitor PriorityQueue Resources ShellExec
Description
  • Benchmark: Functions for time measurement and benchmarking.
  • Eval: Evaluate Rascal commands.
  • IDE: Extend an IDE with interactive, language-specific, features (Eclipse only).
  • Math: Mathematical functions.
  • Maybe: Data type to represent an optional value.
  • Monitor: Monitor the progress of a job.
  • PriorityQueue: A PriorityQueue datatype and associated functions.
  • Resources: A Resource datatype and related functions on Eclipse resources.
  • ShellExec: Execute and manage external processes.
